What does this app do ?

This is the Whatsapp+ Crack not whatsapp Crack..so this crack dont TURN OFF YOUR LAST SEEN (as official latest whatsapp does like iPhone ) but this crack is HIDING LAST SEEN whichshows last seen but with your command. 

History of WHATSAPP+ & its crack

Long ago Whatsapp+ was being developed by Xda developer RAFALENSE and people liked that MOD so rafalesne continued that project and stil adding much more functions in WHATSAPP ...Whatsapp developers didnt liked that MOD so they applied COPYRIGHT and then removed that thread from xda so he is still developing MOD and he is making money by his donation package which FEATURES that HIDE LAST SEEN feature ...
This Crack is to get that HIDE LAST SEEN feature for free ...So enjoy ....And 

Whatsapp+ Features :

*HIDE LAST SEEN

*Immersive mod for KITKATians

*Maximum upload size to 50 MB

*And much more try urself and tell me biggrin


Instructions To INSTALL :

*First backup your conversations by pressing OPTION button 
Go to Settings>Chat settings>Backup Conversations

*Then Uninstall OLDER WHATSAPP & Install ONLY WA+ apk ...

*Click AGREE & CONTINUE

*If you have BACKED UP your CHATS then there should be Restore BUTTON , PRESS IT
(If you Dont get restore button then install original whatsapp from play store , do verification process and then chat with 1-2 person again backup and then uninstall it again install apk that i given to you there will definitely get RESTORE button) 

*Wait

*Press Continue and then 

* Enjoy Whatsapp+ with hiding last seen feature enabled

*Thumbs up this torrent


if you got any kind of error let me know in comments
(DO NOT UPDATE OR YOU LOSE THE Donation /feature)
